source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with an aerial view of a vast agricultural area featuring numerous rectangular fields of varying shades of green and brown, indicating different stages of crop growth or types of crops. Small structures, likely farmhouses or sheds, are scattered throughout the fields, adding to the rural landscape. The camera steadily moves forward, providing a continuous view of the meticulously arranged fields, which are separated by narrow water channels. The background is filled with lush greenery and trees, suggesting a fertile and well-maintained agricultural region. As the camera progresses, more of the expansive fields come into view, showcasing the organized and vibrant agricultural activity.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with an aerial view of a vast agricultural area featuring numerous rectangular fields of varying shades of green and brown, indicating different stages of crop growth or types of crops. Small structures, likely farmhouses or sheds, are scattered throughout the fields, adding to the rural landscape. The camera steadily moves forward, providing a continuous view of the meticulously arranged fields, which are separated by narrow water channels. The background is filled with lush greenery and trees, suggesting a fertile and well-maintained agricultural region. As the camera progresses, more of the expansive fields come into view, showcasing the organized and vibrant agricultural activity.

bad_caption: The video opens with a close-up shot of a bustling city intersection where several buses and cars move through traffic lights in different directions. Pedestrians cross the street in groups, some stopping briefly at the crosswalk before continuing. The camera pans upward, revealing tall office buildings lining both sides of the road, with digital billboards displaying advertisements. As the camera continues to rise, a train passes over an elevated track in the background, and more vehicles enter the intersection, creating a dynamic urban scene. The shot gradually widens to show the full extent of the busy downtown area, with streams of people and vehicles moving in a coordinated flow.
